name: Heath Robinson Solutions
storyline:
The Dark Souls have been vanquished and our heroes depart on their merry way. Lara Croft has returned to the Overworld to raid some tombs or something; meanwhile, Demon Smalls has returned to his home, the museum/gallery at Demon Heights.

And now, a year or so later, he is finally ready to reopen the museum to the public. Included among the new exhibits are various homages to the great W. Heath Robinson (Demon Smalls counts himself as a personal fan). However, the most complicated of the WHR machines remains in its packing cases - even Demon Smalls can't figure this one out. He needs a thinking cap. As luck would have it, a millinery store has opened a branch at Demon Heights.

Lara has been invited back to Demon Heights to view the exhibits and assist in procuring a thinking cap for Smalls.
summary: The sixth entry in The Lizard King series. This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.
